After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers utilizing mobile detailing services compared to the total number of service opportunities, indicating service adoption.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: (Number of Mobile Detailing Services Used / Total Number of Scheduled Mobile Detailing Services) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with mobile detailing services.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with mobile detailing services, including service quality, results, and overall experience, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for Mobile Detailing Services

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to mobile detailing service requests from the time of request to initial contact, reflecting responsiveness to customer needs.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Respond to Mobile Detailing Service Requests

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from mobile detailing.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from mobile detailing services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: (Revenue from Mobile Detailing Services - Cost of Mobile Detailing Services) / Cost of Mobile Detailing Services * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each mobile detailing service provided, including labor, supplies, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: Total Cost of Mobile Detailing Services / Total Number of Mobile Detailing Services

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.KPIS: Compliance with mobile detailing service standards.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Degree to which mobile detailing services adhere to established service standards, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Mobile Detailing Services / Total Number of Mobile Detailing Services) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.KPIS: Mobile detailing service coverage area expansion rate.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Rate at which the coverage area for mobile detailing services is expanded, measured by the increase in geographic service areas per year.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.FORMULA: (Increase in Coverage Area / Previous Coverage Area) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.KPIS: Mobile detailing service uptime and reliability.
After Sales+Mobile Services+Mobile Detai.EXPLANATION: Measure of the availability and reliability of mobile detailing services, including the percentage of time services are available and meet performance expectations.
